summary: Project is a gallery/community app for Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee featuring a 'Saalana Jalsa 2026' section with photos.
known_issues: Photos in Saalana Jalsa 2026 section not displaying when clicked

existing_features.title: Fix the photo lightbox in the GallerySection component so that clicking on any photo in the 'Saalana Jalsa 2026' album correctly opens and displays the full-size image. Investigate and resolve any broken image paths, missing state updates, or incorrect lightbox open/close logic that prevents photos from showing when clicked.

In all locations where 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' appears as a title or subtitle (HeroSection, Header, Footer, index.html, and any other components), append 'Maharajganj Jainpur' after it, so the full text reads 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee Maharajganj Jainpur'.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix photo click/view issue in Saalana Jalsa section - photos not displaying when clicked
Add 'Maharajganj Jainpur' text after 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee'
